Text: Really appreciate this.Looking forward to hearing what I heard are superior remasters,bettering anything previous.Thank you very much.I was disappointed by the other persons upload of this which seemed to be dying a slow death.
Plenty of seeds and leeches, why so slow?
Forget my last comment. It took about an hour to get to speed then it went flying. Txs!
THIS IS IT!!!Great remasters. Get it. Thanks to Spikkie for the healthy share.
Fantastic Up, Spikkie. Many thanks to all the seeders. Great to listen to these without the 30 years worth of scratches!!

Excellent torrent and in FLAC too - the REAL collectors really appreciate the locless FLAC format. 

The only album which (maybe) should be included in this torrent is... 

The Roxy Music - Why Do You Think I'm A Funky Chick? 
http://www.roxyrama.com/releases/unauthorised/vinyl/why_do_you_think_im_a_funky_chick.shtml

I made the double vinyl album myself back in 1977 and it was released early 1978. 

Cheers... 

btw, jag har fortfarande enbart omslag till salu for den som ar intresserad :-)
